definitions: the action or process of officially recognizing someone as having a particular status or being qualified to perform a particular activity
shortDefinitions: action or process of officially recognizing someone as qualified

definitions: official certification that a school or course has met standards set by external regulators

examples.text: the first fully online university to receive national accreditation
the accreditation of professional training programs in Canada

shortDefinitions: official certification that school or course has met standards set by external regulators

definitions: an acknowledgment of a person's responsibility for or achievement of something

examples.text: both parties create authorship, and to make this clear I have always used joint accreditations
